name: Babe Digger
description:
Frank wants needs to repair his broken heart--and what better way to do that than by building a new girlfriend?  Can he create his true love without getting caught?

This was one of the games we worked on for the 2020 Game Jam! We had a blast!

CREDITS

Programmer: Chris Giglio

Cleanup Artist/Sound Designer: Jessica Manning

Concept Art/Asset Design: Chris Hanley

Character Animation: Emma Ingalls

Background Artist/Music & Additional Sound Design: Steven Mora
